data.actual_result: Nothing happens in both ways, you will only see the invitation pop-up when you close these search screens and return to normal chat.
data.expected_result: You see invitation pop-up right after you clicked the invitation link (in both ways: in search results and in expanded messages)
data.short_description: Search screens lie over invite pop-ups
data.steps_to_repro: - Search for messages with invites to other servers (you can search them with "<discord.gg>") and found one (or create them by yourself) - Click the message's invite link in search results - Click the message to jump to it - Click the invite link again - Close the search screens and return to normal chat
